verses.text: \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6963"\w*; come \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w quickly|strong="H2363"\w*; \w give|strong="H0238"\w* \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w when|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* goes up \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6963"\w*.

Keep \w my|strong="H5186"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* desiring \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, \w or|strong="H0408"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* taking part \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* sins \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* evil-doers \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w do|strong="H6466"\w* \w wrong|strong="H7451"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* part \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H5186"\w* good \w things|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* upright give \w me|strong="H1986"\w* punishment; \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* god-fearing \w man|strong="H6662"\w* put \w me|strong="H1986"\w* \w in|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w right|strong="H6662"\w* way; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w sinners|strong="H7451"\w* come \w on|strong="H7451"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* give myself \w to|strong="H5750"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* destruction comes \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w side|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w give|strong="H8085"\w* ear \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* sweet.

\w Our|strong="H0776"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w broken|strong="H1234"\w* \w up|strong="H1234"\w* \w at|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* underworld, \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w broken|strong="H1234"\w* \w by|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* plough.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w turned|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w my|strong="H3588"\w* hope \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*; \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* given \w up|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w death|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* net which \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w put|strong="H3027"\w* \w down|strong="H3027"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* designs \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w evil|strong="H0205"\w*.

Let \w the|strong="H5704"\w* sinners \w be|strong="H7563"\w* \w taken|strong="H5674"\w* \w in|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* nets which \w they|strong="H5704"\w* themselves \w have|strong="H7563"\w* put \w down|strong="H5307"\w*, \w while|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* free.
